name: Gambly.io
description: Gambly is an innovative platform that empowers any ERC-20 or Solana token to seamlessly launch its own fully developed casino. By simply entering the token's contract address on our website, users can activate an automated casino featuring multiple games, all tailored specifically to their token. To gamble on Gambly.io you must be at least 18 years old or meet the legal minimum age for gambling in your jurisdiction, as required by applicable laws. If you have minors in your household, we recommend reviewing parental control software as a helpful tool to manage and restrict content accessible on your devices. Here are some useful links to assist you with this.
